content: what you are doing or knit flat round 20 k1 k2tog round 21 kfb k knit 3 more rounds of i-cord bind off leaving a 6 in tail to use to secure the wire attaching the legs and finishing feet knit both legs first then work the wire through the bottom of the fish leaving ample length on either side for each leg the wire will go through the bottom of the stuffed body and you will need to create a bend to have the legs face vertically see image below white portion is the part of the wire inside the fish in diagram below work wire through in the same manner as the arms bend wire to form the foot at the ankle bend and form a loop to secure in the end of the foot use the cast on tail to secure the wire use cast on tail to attach to the body and hide the wire finishing touches use white yarn to embroider a circle around safety eyes and to add a black mouth
